publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3356.1 Murdo Fraser: St Andrew’s Day Bank Holiday (Scotland) Bill—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3356) in the name of Dennis Canavan, insert at end “but, in so doing, believes that a new bank holiday established as result of the Bill should not be so established unless an existing bank holiday is no longer specified as a bank holiday.”
S2M-3356.1 St Andrew’s Day Bank Holiday (Scotland) Bill (lodged on 30 September 2005) Mr David Davidson*
